channel.title: Debugging :: IT From Scratch
channel.description: Exception Handling Input def spam(divide_by): try: return 42 / divide_by except ZeroDivisionError: print('Error: Invalid argument.') print(spam(2)) print(spam(12)) print(spam(0)) print(spam(1)) Output 21.0 3.5 Error: Invalid argument. None 42.0 Input def spam(divide_by): return 42 / divide_by try: print(spam(2)) print(spam(12)) print(spam(0)) print(spam(1)) except ZeroDivisionError: print('Error: Invalid argument.') Output 21.0 3.5 Error: Invalid argument. Raising Exceptions Input
